name: CC & SH Smash Hits
description: CC & SH Smash Hits was the first disc release game for CC & SH. It was a compilation disc released in 2006 that featured six of their most popularly downloaded freeware games. The disc release was born out of necessity when their filehost cut back their storage space immensely. A version for both Windows and Mac with a remade menu system and additional options such as border and music, is under development.
